General.Name: Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells plastic and metal packaging solutions in Turkey and internationally. Its products are used for paints, glues, lube oils, chemicals, ice creams, yoghurts, cheese, frozen foods, honey, jams, olives, hazelnut cocoa-butter, candies, spices/powder, drinks, hair gel, and cosmetic products. The company serves clients in paint, chemicals, and food sectors. Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Dilovasi, Turkey.
General.Address: Dilovasi Organize Sanayi Bölgesi, Dilovasi, Turkey, 41455
